phrases.phrase: 살 땐 흠이 있는 줄 몰랐어요.
meanings: 매장에서 I didn't see the defect when I purchased it.
매장에서 I didn't notice any defects, when I first got it.
매장에서 I didn't know there was anything wrong with it at first.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 I don't get up till my mother gets me up.
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 I don't get up until my mom wakes me up.

vlive.korean: [#3 나에게 뭐든지 다 해 줄 때] 마실 거 하나 사 올까? 따뜻한 거? [#3 When he does everything for me] Do you want me to get you something hot? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 연애할 때 가장 설레는 순간 [입콬가이드] 리얼하이로맨스(Real Highschool Romance) #3

examples.korean: We had to wait almost an hour before he condescended to see us. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 자기를 낮춰 우리를 만나러 와 줄 때까지 우리는 거의 한 시간을 기다려야 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We had to wait almost an hour before he condescended to see us. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: When you give each other everything, it becomes an even trade. Each wins all. (Lois McMaster Bujold) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 서로에게 모든 것을 줄 때 평등한 거래가 된다. 각자가 모든 것을 얻게 된다. (로이스 맥마스터 부욜, 사랑명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: When you give each other everything, it becomes an even trade. Each wins all. (Lois McMaster Bujold) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Because he has cartocacoethes, he always tells me a country's name when I cook for him. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 이미지 형상화 강박증이 있어서, 내가 그에게 요리해 줄 때면 항상 국가 이름을 말한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: Because he has cartocacoethes, he always tells me a country's name when I cook for him. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: At my old company I had to use my money first on business trips and wait to get reimbursed, but at my new company they actually put me in a nice hotel and let me use the corporate credit card. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 예전 회사에서는 출장 갈 때 내 돈을 먼저 쓰고 보상해줄 때까지 기다려야 했는데, 새로운 회사에서는 좋은 호텔에 묵게 해주고 법인 카드도 쓰게 해줘. DARAKWON
examples.english: At my old company I had to use my money first on business trips and wait to get reimbursed, but at my new company they actually put me in a nice hotel and let me use the corporate credit card. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Be careful when you unleash your dog. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 개를 풀어줄 때는 조심해. Neungyule
examples.english: Be careful when you unleash your dog. Add to Wordbook
